sn2.9:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. Tena kho pana samayena candimā devaputto rāhunā asurindena gahito hoti. Atha kho candimā devaputto bhagavantaṁ anussaramāno tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn2.9:2: "Namo te buddha vīratthu,vippamuttosi sabbadhi;Sambādhapaṭipannosmi,tassa me saraṇaṁ bhavā"ti.
sn2.9:3: Atha kho bhagavā candimaṁ devaputtaṁ ārabbha rāhuṁ asurindaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn2.9:4: "Tathāgataṁ arahantaṁ,candimā saraṇaṁ gato;Rāhu candaṁ pamuñcassu,buddhā lokānukampakā"ti.
sn2.9:5: Atha kho rāhu asurindo candimaṁ devaputtaṁ muñcitvā taramānarūpo yena vepacitti asurindo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā saṁviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho rāhuṁ asurindaṁ vepacitti asurindo gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn2.9:6: "Kiṁ nu santaramānova,rāhu candaṁ pamuñcasi;Saṁviggarūpo āgamma,kiṁ nu bhītova tiṭṭhasī"ti.
sn2.9:7: "Sattadhā me phale muddhā,jīvanto na sukhaṁ labhe;Buddhagāthābhigītomhi,no ce muñceyya candiman"ti.
